channel.description: Define-word Quick word definition Dictionary server Dictionary server lookup Webster Look up word in Merriam-Webster Powerthesaurus Synonym lookup Sentences lookup Prose linting Prose linting with Vale Use C-c t f to toggle flycheck. The Vale syntax checker will not check inside headings tagged with noexport. Outside of the noexport sections we can use these comments to turn Vale off and on:
